Sentencas: The reaction between a Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (Ni-YSZ) cermet anode and La5.4WO12- (LW) during cell fabrication is utilized to reduce carbon deposition in solid oxide fuel cells operated on methane fuel.
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel

Sentencas: The effect of the phase reactions on the microstructure, electrical conductivity, chemical interactions, and coking resistance of the anodes are systematically investigated.
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel

Sentencas: NixWy and La-doped YSZ are formed by phase reactions and the synergistic effect between them increases the coking resistance dramatically.
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel

Sentencas: 2wt% is demonstrated to be the optimal amount of LW to modify Ni-YSZ to achieve best coking resistance.
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel

Sentencas: The cell with Ni-YSZ-2wt% LW anode demonstrates a superior peak power density of 943mWcm(-2) at 800 degrees C with humidified methane as fuel, which is 10% higher than that of Ni-YSZ (859mWcm(-2)).
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel

Sentencas: Furthermore, the cell is stable for 200h in methane fuel with no clear performance degradation while the cell with unmodified anode fails after 0.5h's operation.
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel

Sentencas: In summary, we provide a new way to rationally design Ni-based cermet anode with high electrocatalytic activity and excellent coking resistance.
Titulo: Rational Design of Superior, Coking-Resistant, Nickel-Based Anodes through Tailoring Interfacial Reactions for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Operated on Methane Fuel
